title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.2 - Arrangement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.2 - Arrangement

State Regulations

Schedules shall be prepared and arranged as
follows: (a) title page; (b) table of contents; (c) general information; (d) service classifications or rate
tables; (e) statements; (f) supplements; (g) orders of the commission; and
(h) addenda. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
